website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking a sleeping house for their indoor felines should check out this stylish leopard-print model.
pros: Customers appreciate the product's easy assembly
Warms up to cat's body temperature, keeping animal from overheating
Well-padded cushion to prevent ripping and tearing
cons: Small build holds only one cat

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty condo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 18 year old cat who loved to seek out warm places. As she got older, she had a more difficult time staying warm. She loved this "condo"! It doesn't get too hot, just warm. So, I didn't have to worry about her getting burned or anything like that. It's easy to put together, take down and very easy to clean! Unfortunately, Misty passed away recently. I gave this to my sister for her kitties. When we get new cats, I'll purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Science Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: This item is smaller than it appears in the photo. I have three kittens all under a year old, so the size is perfect for them right now, but they still have a lot of growing to do and it will be interesting to see how it holds up. Very attractive looking and even though the kittens completely ignored it for the first couple of days, they now love it and take turns using it. The youngest and smallest of the three likes to sit on the top, which is good since I am not quite sure how sturdy it is. Overall, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Antoniya Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Snug and warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an outdoor cat who moved into our garage. She had been sleeping on the water heater, but now she thinks this house is absolutely the greatest, and it doesn't require a big jump to get to the heat. It provides adequate heat for South Texas and cleans up easily. I start by brushing it off and wash it with soap and water occasionally. The flat top is a great idea: I can put my jar of Meow Mix up there to drop into the bowls that are right outside the house door.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bronson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: My crotchety old lady kitty loves this thing, she barely ever leaves it these days. She has always been one for privacy, and getting older she's appreciated heating pads and warm spots a bit more. This is the best of both worlds, and has a fetching leopard print as well. One thing I appreciate is that the top zips off if the kitty doesn't want to come out, and digs her claws in. I can open the top and snatch her out before she knows what's up.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Korpenfelt

customer_reviews.title: warm up quickly and stays warm.
customer_reviews.text: this product has a set of pros and cons I will list below, overall it does a good job. pros: heats up quickly. well insulated. can support a cat's weight on top. cons: no switching or temperature control. material is not particularly the easiest to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eng. Ayyad

customer_reviews.title: Very little heat, otherwise it’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Just as the other reviews said, it gives off a tiny bit of heat. It is only 4 watts after all.. Otherwise it’s a cute little hut, not bulky and perfect for 1 cat. **Update: cat loves this and is always sleeping in it every time I look. It triples in heat when he’s in there and he sticks his head out of the hole, probably to not overheat. Good buy, no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Nells

customer_reviews.title: Subtle warmth to keep Sphynx kitten happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Sphynx kitten. She isn't quite old enough to figure it out on her own, but today she spent the afternoon napping in it which was nice. Hopefully she learns to associate it with warmth soon, but right now she prefers to be held! The pad doesn't get super hot, just slightly warm to touch. It kind of feels the warm patch a cat would leave behind after they've been sleeping on your bed. This is great because it means kitty won't overheat when sleeping inside. Will update later when kitty is older to report whether she actually uses it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: L Wardle

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to rescues for moms and babies
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 was an excellent bed for feral mom and her 7 little ones. The zipper top allowed me to check on them regularly. As they started figuring out climbing they loved getting on top of it. Now that they have been weaned it looks scratched up and ready for the trash but I wouldn't hesitate to get another one for a new family. If I could change one thing about it though I would make it bigger and the inside bottom that comes out would be able to be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Garage Kitties
customer_reviews.text: Our adopted barn kitties live in our garage with pet door access. This is a great option to keep them warm in the winter. They did not seem to like the house with the plastic flaps. I think they like this one because even though it's closed, the opening is wide and they can see outside. I haven't seen them in it together but think they would fit (10 lbs each). Easy to put together and use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasta in VA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just set this up for my sassy cat. She got right into it immediately. She fits it it great and she weighs 15 pounds. I wouldn’t use it for deep winter. I live in Oregon. It’s in the garage which is about 45-50 degrees today. The pad is removable so you can wash it. It’s very nice.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Only one like it, all around good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My cat desired a sleep house with a second story she could perch upon and be taller than all the things. She also requires that her sleeping quarters be equipped with heating pads that run all day at no expense to her. This bed checked all the boxes! However Her Majesty was gracious enough to leave the decision of color options up to me. Much to my dismay the ONLY option is the loud leopard print that kinda throws off the manly office style I was going for. If only there was an option to just have a dark brown top. Other than that it’s great! And she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: My cat won't go in
customer_reviews.text: My cat just won't go in. He's 6 years old, 15 pounds, so maybe he's just too big...anyway, he's suspicious, I guess because it's completely dark inside as he looks at it from the outside maybeit just looks like a trap??). I tried to coax him in with food and toys, tried opening it up and placing him in it...no luck at all. He has no interest, even on a cold night. It looks like a good design though...no complaints about the build. Just not for my guy I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Tannenbaum

customer_reviews.title: My cat is in love with this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It was extremely easy to put together. I think it came with instructions, but it was pretty self explanatory. And my cat, Samara loves it. I have three different heated cat beds of different varieties from the K&H brand. And they are all amazing. This one is great because not only is it heated, but it provides a little hidey hole for her to feel secure in. As far as size goes, it should be big enough for 2 small to medium sized cats to snuggle up in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: its very well made and heats up just the right amount.. but if you have more than one cat, like me, then get a couple.. my cats fight over this bed.. Just wanted to UPDATE. Ive had it since last winter and its plugged in 24/7 for about 6 months of the year and its still working great and I was able to take the cover off and wash it and it came out great. I saw one person say it quit after a week and another saying it didnt heat well. I think they got a DUD and should have contacted amazon or the seller for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice look!
customer_reviews.text: It was more my wife’s choice than mine 😂 BUT it came out nice, although my kitten 🐱 loved the top more than the bottom, she will sleep on the inside occasionally. Still great buy! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Alex Corado

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Cat LOVES
customer_reviews.text: Our cat absolutely loves his house. We keep it on a sheltered front porch and it has worked great for months now. My friend bought one for her cat and she keeps it on a carport. She says her cat loves it as well. Great purchase. Smaller than it looks in the picture but cozy for one cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Minor Trivett

customer_reviews.title: My cat genuinely loves this bed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my older cat and now I have competition for her affection. She used to always sleep on my pillow - now it's 50/50 between me and the cat bed. She will nap in this bed for most of the morning, come out for snacks, head back to the bed. She absolutely loves this bed and it's the most used piece of pet furniture I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Sapling

customer_reviews.title: Nice heated bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Our feral cats are on the back porch where it's cooler. They LOVE this bed. It's sturdy and it's warmth is just right on the cold nights. Not hot but so snuggly. The cord stays out of the way because it goes up through the top zipper. Some of the cats like sitting on top and some like it inside. I'm going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not able to keep animals warm in freezing weather
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but does not heat the bottom pad as hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: A nice little cat-cubby that folds neatly for storage
customer_reviews.text: A nice little cat-cubby that folds neatly for storage, but the 4 Watt heater is a bit ineffective and throws off about as much heat as a ladybug (or maybe a cricket). Even our lazy cats - who seek out any source of warmth as a nap spot - haven't spent much time in the sleep house, instead choosing to lay on the computer key board (which is exactly why we got the heated sleep house in the first place!). That could just be a cat thing. Anyway - a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Higginstein

customer_reviews.title: Someone is so happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sixteen year old little wedge head Siamese. He loves warmth and I've had heating pads (for animals) for him for years. I just set this heated Thermo-Kitty Clubhouse up. Without pointing it out and left it. He is deaf and was curled up with the dog, oblivious I was doing. Anything. A short while later I missed him and he was curled up inside and happy as a little pig in sunshine! He loves his little heated bed and it has cut down on the night time caterwauling! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Nice hidout, especially post recieving meds or if they want to be left alone
customer_reviews.text: My cats are still confused about being to sit or stand on the top, but it is used daily. The heat is not like what you get from a heating pad or electric blanket. It is just a low level of warm for comfort. The tag said it costs only 8 cents a year or something very low like that to run. Good purchase. I have 2 cats, but have lots of beds, condos and creative hideaways for them to sleep and play in, so although the advice from someone reviewer here to get 2 is a great one, the peace has remained in my home with just one.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it. So do I.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I set it up, kitty was inside. She loves sleeping in it as well as on top. Seems sturdy enough. It is slightly warm when plugged in after a couple of hours -- important as kitty is older and starting to seek out more warm places than usual, even in warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Miss Boo Boo loves it
customer_reviews.text: Update: Miss Boo Boo continues to love her thermal hut as I call it. I truly believe she's comfortable and is relieving her arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat that sleeps in the garage and it gets very cold out there. We were worried he wouldn’t like it, but once he got in, he seems to love it! It doesn’t seem to feel very warm, but it does the job! Now I don’t worry about him!
customer_reviews.author: Rose M Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and the pad warms when you keep pressure on it. It doesn’t feel warm to the touch. My cat liked it for a minute. He prefers his heated throw instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cre8ivesteph

customer_reviews.title: Great Warmth, Callie Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed my cat slept on the furnace at night so to bring her upstairs more I decided to get one of these beds. She absolutely loves this bed and so do I. It was incredibly easy to assemble and I often use it to help me apply her flea and tick medicine too. She is always in this bed and it really came in handy when my furnace broke because I didn’t have to worry about keeping her warm! Definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. It’s a sturdy yet cute cat bed. My cat sleeps in it nightly since I first brought it home. I recommend this for shy cats that like to hide. You can always unplug the bed during warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: Garage cat loves this thing. 2 years and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Garage cat loves this thing. 2 years and the heating pad still warms as it should. When I try to check and make sure it still works I have to fight the cat to get my hand in though. She thinks she belongs in there.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Please help get kitty in the house!
customer_reviews.text: While it's attractive, and too easy to assemble... can anyone give me a hint how to introduce my independent outdoor cat to a warm container like this. I know I've read catnip, but Kia has never encountered catnip, maybe treats, but I believe she'll be a bit rejecting of the confinement. I just believe this will give her the winter warmth she will need (as I have tested it myself). I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Tigger-approved!
customer_reviews.text: My tomcat loves being HOT. This Thermo-Kitty Clubhouse, complete with matching heating pad, has taken the place of a radiant oil-filled heater that ran my electricity bill up several dollars. The cat was curious and a bit stand-offish at first, but once he discovered the warmth from the pad, that did it for him. He has claimed it as his own "hideaway" and I am glad that he can be warm without becoming overheated. The leopard print is a nice touch, too.
customer_reviews.author: G. N. Clark

customer_reviews.title: This is a great "house" for my cats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great "house" for my cats.....HOWEVER, it does NOT provide any heat at all. I plugged it in and left it on for 24 hours, barely a touch of heat. Then I put a blanket in it and it still did not provide any heat. I am very disappointed as the heat was the entire reason I purchased the house in the first place. I would definitely not spend the money on it again.
customer_reviews.author: JRBAKE

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Cat Bed
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. It's a little snug for my bigger cats but they curl up in it anyway. The padded top is sturdy enough for another cat to nap on top. The cover on the heating pad zips off for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas present for our outdoor cat. - She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our little black female Bombay outdoors cat loves the Summer heat, but the Winter cold deals her misery. Since we bought this with the heat pad option and have it on our back porch, she stays in this hut most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Philipp2

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible yet sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was deceived by the lightweight and small box tuis came in. But the walls collapse and fold inside. It is a zipper attachment to the top, but seems very sturdy. My 18 lb cat took to the new heated bed with no problems or coaxing necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Nan'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: My cats loves this. I set this up less than an hour ago and she is already fast asleep in her cat cave. I have two cats who are now fighting over this. Also, for those wondering about size... my cat is about 14 pounds and fits perfectly. It could fit a small dog or a fat cat.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: My cats are too spoiled for this...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my indoor cats, but they hated it. They would rather lay on the vent it seems, so I put this on the back porch near the house for our outdoor kitties. They will use it, but if the Kitty House is free they prefer to sleep in that. Though it is not necessarily for outdoor use, it seems to do fine and has held up well this first year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Spooky Mom

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty love this!
customer_reviews.text: This heated pet bed is GREAT! I find my cats in it a lot during the winter. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: N. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Smallish but cozy
customer_reviews.text: I'm testing one out in my garage with my ferals. It's smaller than I thought. One adult cat fits. It seems a great solution for helping keep them warm. May have to buy 3 more!
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is a fault with just this bed, but there is no heat, the cats don't go near it. I have another A frame they fight over this one is right next door to it but have never seen a cat in it. I finally unplugged it, should of sent it back and got another A frame
customer_reviews.author: K9saver

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I received this right when cold weather set in, and now my cat sleeps in it as much as his bed! The ambient warmth is great; I don't have to worry about it turning off or getting too hot. The construction is decent for the price; supports a 14-pound cat easily. Collapses flat for easy storage, which I didn't expect, but very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Cat magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love it. We have 4 cats and 2 beds, so I'm here to buy another bed. Two of our cats, one about 8 lbs, the other about 16 lbs curl up in one bed - it's snug, but I'm sure it's extra warm that way. There is a learning curve for the cats however. you have to coax the cats into the bed at first, because my understanding is that the bed has to have weight on it to get warm, but once they are in it long enough to realize it is heated, it's a cat magnet. Had one of the beds for about a year and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Heated Kitty Clubhouse
customer_reviews.text: I like the kitty clubhouse, just because its enclosed and allows my cat to get in out of the wind, but am not been pleased with the heating unit...its does not work, as i had hoped it would. I think it would have been cheaper to buy a kitty club house / and heating pad separately - and it probably would work a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: both loved it immediately
customer_reviews.text: We just received this, so I can't speak to how well it holds up. Two cats, both loved it immediately. Really only big enough for one medium sized cat (although both do try to shove in at the same time like people in a VW). Having heated beds for both keeps them off the furniture...big help.
customer_reviews.author: Constance K.

customer_reviews.title: Kitties favorite house!
customer_reviews.text: We have one cat who is very antisocial, and I wanted to get her something where she could sleep while feeling secure. This fits the bill nicely. She loves it! Sturdy enough for a 8 (ish) pound cat to sleep on top Very easy to assemble (literally zips together) The inside pad is removable for easy cleaning Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christine H

customer_reviews.title: YOUR CAT WILL LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this bed for cats (or a small dog) from K & H products. Their items are made well, and our cat is inseparable from her heated bed. This is our second purchase of K & H heated beds. This one has a nice feature that allows the animal to sleep in the heated bottom portion or perch on the top level for a better view of the outdoors and imaginations of how many small animals they could catch...
customer_reviews.author: retsc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old kitty. We live in the South and this winter has been much colder than what we normally have, She loves it and spends most of her time curled up and sleeping happily in it. I know that long after winter ends and we unplug the the heating pad (not that you have to, this is just a personal preference), we will still find her there sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn DeLong

customer_reviews.title: A favorite for my cats
customer_reviews.text: This heated house was inhabited immediately by one of my cats. My multi-cat household demanded that I purchase several more of these. My geriatric cats especially enjoy the gentle heat it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Our Peter just loves this heated hut! It's a must have for sphynx owners that live in cold climates. Works like a charm! Love how easy it is to take apart and wash!
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Cats fight over this
customer_reviews.text: Kitties love this heated cave. Sturdy construction our 15 lb kitty can sit on top and I don't have to worry about it caving in on the inside occupant. If quickly became the favorite sleeping place.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Power Washer
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. Should be machine washable or power washer washable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Vrieze

customer_reviews.title: Emma loves her house.
customer_reviews.text: We have our cat get the lion haircut because as she gets older she’s not cleaning herself as well as she once did. This makes her colder and she was sitting in front of our air ducts. This sleep house provides the safety and warmth she needs and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Cats actually use it
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my patio for my feral cats and they love it and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in for cold nights. It's not too hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Plugs in for cold nights. It's not too hot, only the kitty can feel the warmth if he stays in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: Cosplay Fan

customer_reviews.title: Had to add a heating pad to it to make it work better for the hairless cat
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't heat up very much... Had to add a heating pad to it to make it work better for the hairless cat. Would NOT recommend this purchase. Shipping was great, it arrived in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kitty house
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's cat loves it. My daughter's cat used to take the heating pads from the babies I foster every chance she gets, now they fight her for her bed. She curls up inside of it, and half the time hangs out of it, but uses it often.
customer_reviews.author: alew

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this house!
customer_reviews.text: I have an indoor/outdoor cat and in the wintertime she likes to sleep in the garage sometimes. This past winter was colder than ever, so I got this Thermo-Kitty Clubhouse. She LOVES it! When it's warm out, she sleeps on top of it. And the leapord print matches her personality.
customer_reviews.author: bookWorm

customer_reviews.title: My cats could never get used to this product. I may donate it to a shelter. Maybe a homeless cat will appreciate it more.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but my cats never took to this. I have given them a significant amount of time (months) to become adjusted to it, but they still don't seem to like it. I may take to a local animal shelter and donate it.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Austin

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this!!! It has just the right temperature so it’s not too hot. Also like that the cover for the heating pad is machine washable ❤️
customer_reviews.author: J.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: For Christmas Santa brought me this nice bed for being such a good girl
customer_reviews.text: Hi, My name is Baby. For Christmas Santa brought me this nice bed for being such a good girl. I can even plug it in and it will keep me warm! Now I sleep better at night. Meow! You should get one for your best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson B.

customer_reviews.title: Even in the middle of summer my 7 pound kitty ...
customer_reviews.text: Even in the middle of summer my 7 pound kitty is always cold! It took bit to get her to recognize that the pad would heat. I finally preheated it with a pan of warm water then put her in a scratched her head till she noticed it was warm. Now she hooked and it's only July! Miss Tippy Toes gives it 5-stars!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: This one is for tiny kittens, not for adult cats that weigh 14lb.
customer_reviews.author: djay

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this bed and use it everyday! Sometimes at the same time with one in the bed and one on top. You know it's sturdy when your 14 lb cat is on top and it's just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together for the spoiled cat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this is made...the cat hates it. Spoiled, rotten kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Mobile Dog Groomer

customer_reviews.title: kitty loves it but...
customer_reviews.text: my kitty loves this and when I first got it it was very warm however now it seems to not be heating up anymore. since she likes to sleep downstairs in the basement where it is chilly I may have to get a regular heating pad to put under it because it is definitely not keeping her as toasty as before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the cats like it so that's all that matters
customer_reviews.text: i like the heated option to keep a warm place for them in the winter or on my enclosed porch. particularly good for older cats with health issues. they like to sit on top of it as well as on the inside. as long as they use it, it's worth the money. nice that it folds down flat for transport or storage too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schopf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES it! She doesn't want to come out
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Anne

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough
customer_reviews.text: Very small for an average sized cat. Ours sleeps on top of it with parts of her hanging over. Bottom makes her claustrophobic and is not being used.
customer_reviews.author: NostalgicMom

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how the cats would like it. We have another heated cat bed that is not enclosed which all three of our cats enjoy so I thought we would give this a try. They all take turns in it. It has been an excellent purchase. When each of the cats is in it, they have such a look of pleasure on their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly accurate product description decent sized warms up very well. Truly only works when your pet is inside which is awesome because you don’t have to worry about it wasting electricity! 100% recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer carey

customer_reviews.title: Heated Thermo-Kitty Clubhouse
customer_reviews.text: Kitty acted all pissy when first shoved inside the hole of this but she soon realized she had just crossed the threshold into the Kitty Holy Grail. If you tell her its time to go to bed she runs so fast to it and into the hole you can feel the wind on your legs as she runs past....
customer_reviews.author: J-fer

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't work AT ALL.  barely warmed
customer_reviews.text: This barely gets warm to the hand and does not come through the padding at all. I plugged it in for hours, waiting kept trying it. It is so warm, the heating pad can be used directly on a baby's skin, so you know its not warn enough for cold weather use. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: My cats would never use it =(
customer_reviews.text: Neither of my cats ever took a liking to this, wasn't used even once so I can't give it a good review. I guess it is up to your cats whether or not it is a good product lol.
customer_reviews.author: Fluffy Puppy

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Thinks She's in Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I have become my cat's best friend since I got her this. It's in the garage and, when it gets cold, she's THERE!!! I like that it heats up based on the ambient temperature and the cat's temperature so she doesn't fry. Perfect size for my 10 pound cat. Larger cats could use too, but might get snug.
customer_reviews.author: yolyfe

customer_reviews.title: Well, he likes the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this product (except the price being a bit high), but my cat never would get inside the house. I took the heating pad out and put his favorite blanket on it and he seemed to like that better. He did not hesitate to lay down in the packaging though. I put a towel in that and he loves it! XD
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional little cube
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little house for inside for my cats to use when the temperature is cool. They love it so much. I probably should buy more for all of them to have since they don't want to share! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karol

customer_reviews.title: Yoda approved
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my moms new teacup puppy chihuahua terrier mix, little Yoda loves his new warm and toasty cave
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not realy warm.
customer_reviews.text: I tested the heated cat bed as instructed, but I could not feel the warmth that the heated pillow was suppose to be emitting. I was not very happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Jadel Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Poor product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very poor product. The heat pad doesn’t work. It’s very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good
customer_reviews.text: Works well, wish it heated up a little quicker or had a smaller opening. Overall very good though
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the largest size, Very small for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the largest size,Very small for a 10 pound cat! Cat would not go near it! had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Olga K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small cats
customer_reviews.text: While I did return this because it's not big enough for either of my fat-ass cats, it would be perfect for a more petite kitty, or kitten. It's well made.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, though
customer_reviews.text: Barely, barely gets warm. Much cooler than our previous cat bed. Our older cat loves warmth , but couldn't care less for this. Looks nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Veebee

customer_reviews.title: Bella loves her nice warm house!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is in the garage at night, it gets really cold out there. This heated kitty house is wonderfull . Bella is in her little house all the time. So glad it's heated & very safe Would recommend to all
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: It was very nice and easy to put together but I wanted an ...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT for outdoors even though when you look under heated kitty house this comes up. It was very nice and easy to put together but I wanted an outdoor house for two stray cats that hang out on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fowler

customer_reviews.title: In it or on it, cat is happy.
customer_reviews.text: Whether warming inside or curled up on top, my cat seems to be very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: New home  for "Baby" my cat.
customer_reviews.text: "Baby" my cat, loves this thing. She was inside it even before we could get the top zipped shut. Now she claims it as "her's".
customer_reviews.author: Arthur E.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty loves his little hideaway. Love the fact that it can be folded and stored away when necessary. Good for the smaller homes or apartments. Our kitten loves to sleep inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to zip up
customer_reviews.text: My cat lounges on here all day! She absolutely loves it! Very easy to zip up, and easy to break down (although she'd be upset). ;)
customer_reviews.author: B. Tobian

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: One inside and one on top. Both cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patpaye

customer_reviews.title: They love having this thing out in our barn
customer_reviews.text: my cats gave it 5 stars. They love having this thing out in our barn
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Heat to justify cost
customer_reviews.text: this house did not heat as i had hoped it was just a small heating pad stuffed between foam padding. i put a different heating pad with a timer on it but either way fluffy was not impressed. it looked cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Cmomwstyle

customer_reviews.title: The Cat's Meow!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife's Siamese cat, and it was a big hit! It was easy to assemble and looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cat bed.
customer_reviews.text: Can't hardly get my cat to come out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Kitty says buy this.....
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these and our kitties love them.
customer_reviews.author: ParrotHeadPete

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat
customer_reviews.text: The house is nice but the heating pad barely gets warm at all even after being plugged in for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: K&H email me coupons for more reviews
customer_reviews.text: I love it for my Sphinx cat. It’s absolutely perfect for her, the size is big enough for her. The cover and opening create a dark enough sleeping spot for her..
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Amazonsworth

customer_reviews.title: It like an extra extra low setting on a heat
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get as warm as I would have thought. It like an extra extra low setting on a heat blanket
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heated cat homes
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 for garage cats. Arrived on time. Boxed well. Cats took to these right awAy. Winter of 2013 wAsnt as bad with these. Cats love them in summer too. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: My kitties absolutely love their house
customer_reviews.text: My kitties absolutely love their house. I have 2 cats both weighing around 8 lbs and they love to snuggle together in this house.
customer_reviews.author: AC

product_meta.title: K&H Pet Products Kitty Sleephouse
product_meta.description: Style:Heated| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThis sturdy Thermo-Kitty Clubhouse is made with micro suede and soft fleece. This heated Clubhouse has hard plastic walls that stand the test of time. Kitties can sleep inside or rest on top. Zips apart and lays flat for shipping and storage. Indoor use only. MET listed. 1-Year warranty.
feature_bullets: Thermostatically controlled 4 watt heater warms to your pet's normal body temperature when in use
